value: Movie House is an online platform where you can browse trending films, explore movies by genres, and learn about your favorite directors.

content.section: Do I need an account to use Movie House?
value: No account is needed to browse. However, creating an account lets you save favorites, follow genres, and get personalized recommendations.

content.section: How often is the trending movies list updated?
value: We update the trending movies daily based on viewership, ratings, and social buzz.

content.section: Can I request a movie or director to be added?
value: Yes, use the contact form or email us with your suggestion!
Email and name when you sign up
To send updates, only if opted-in
You can update or delete your account at any time. Contact us for assistance.
We use encryption and secure protocols to protect your personal data.
